description: Colubmine (Aquilegia 'Music Mix') is an amazing plant species! This hybrid variety is perfect for any garden, as it produces a breathtaking array of bright, vibrant blossoms. The delicate, yet hardy flowers are crowned with delightfully petite and intricate blooms. They come in multiple shades of purple, blue, white, and pink with delicate star-like pale yellow centers. Furthermore, this hardy perennial is known to be drought-tolerant and prefers dry lightly shaded areas with moist but well-drained soil. A true beauty, Aquilegia 'Music Mix' will be a charming addition to any outdoor area.
